channel.title: Disappearing props in Blast Pit
channel.description:
On the return journey for powering up the rocket, there is a pallet of barrels and a trolley laying by a red door labeled "6" with a keep out sign. However, they vanish on the level change.
bm_c1a4b (level that lacks them) setpos -67.789505 2104.956787 1216.031250;setang 9.190063 170.881348 -0.333528 bm_c1a4d (level with them) setpos -114.124802 2862.929443 1216.031250;setang 18.866510 172.092758 0.000000
[spoiler] [img]https://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/450707476763590168/C322B665E15E3AA405C5B61C45FF559AE9DB710A/[/img] After level change (heading back):
[img]https://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/450707476763590913/9CF64A099C0D5308BDACF027293097326D3FC8B5/[/img] [/spoiler]

item.title: Disappearing props in Blast Pit
item.dc:creator: Sage_J_Fox
item.description:
On the return journey for powering up the rocket, there is a pallet of barrels and a trolley laying by a red door labeled “6” with a keep out sign. However, they vanish on the level change.

bm_c1a4b (level that lacks them)
setpos -67.789505 2104.956787 1216.031250;setang 9.190063 170.881348 -0.333528
bm_c1a4d (level with them)
setpos -114.124802 2862.929443 1216.031250;setang 18.866510 172.092758 0.000000

1600×900

After level change (heading back):

1600×900
